info.title: Ex Libris APIs
info.description: For more information on how to use these APIs, including how to create an API key required for authentication, see [Alma REST APIs](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis).

externalDocs.description: Detailed documentation on these APIs at the Ex Libris Developer Network.

get.description: This API returns a list of Printouts.

parameters.name: letter
parameters.description: Printout Name. Optional.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Printout status. Optional. Valid values are: Printed, Pending, Canceled.

parameters.name: printer_id
parameters.description: Printout Printer

parameters.name: printed_by
parameters.description: Printed by: ALL/ME. This field is relevant when using the API from within Cloud Apps.

parameters.name: printout_id
parameters.description: A list of Printout IDs (for example: 123,456,778) from 1 to the limit of 100 Optional. Use of this option overrides all of the filtering parameters

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of results. Optional. Valid values are 0-100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of the results returned. Optional. Default value: 0, which means that the first results will be returned.

200.description: OK - This method returns an object based on rest_printouts.xsd. See [here](/alma/apis/docs/xsd/rest_printouts.xsd)

post.description: This API performs an action on printouts: mark as printed or canceled. 10,000 records can be handled in one requests. Only printouts which were updated will be returned.

parameters.name: letter
parameters.description: Printout Name. Optional.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Printout status. Optional. Valid values are: Printed, Pending, Canceled.

parameters.name: printer_id
parameters.description: Printout Printer

parameters.name: printed_by
parameters.description: Printed by: ALL/ME. This field is relevant when using the API from within Cloud Apps.

parameters.name: printout_id
parameters.description: A list of Printout IDs (for example: 123,456,778) from 1 to the limit of 100 Optional. Use of this option overrides all of the filtering parameters

parameters.name: op
parameters.description: The operation to perform on the printout. Currently, the options are: 'mark_as_printed','mark_as_canceled'

200.description: OK - This method returns an object based on rest_printouts.xsd. See [here](/alma/apis/docs/xsd/rest_printouts.xsd)

get.description: This Web service returns a Printout given a Printout ID.

parameters.name: printout_id
parameters.description: The Printout ID

200.description: OK - This method returns an object based on rest_printout.xsd. See [here](/alma/apis/docs/xsd/rest_printout.xsd)

post.description: This API operates on an printout. given a Printout ID.

parameters.name: printout_id
parameters.description: The Printout ID

parameters.name: op
parameters.description: The operation to perform on the printout. Currently, the options are 'mark_as_printed','mark_as_canceled'

200.description: OK - This method returns an object based on rest_printout.xsd. See [here](/alma/apis/docs/xsd/rest_printout.xsd)

400.description:
Bad Request

402896 - 'Invalid printout ID.'

40166410 - 'Invalid parameter.'

40166412 - 'Failed to perform action.'

get.description: This API returns a list of requested resources to be picked from the shelf in Alma

parameters.name: library
parameters.description: The library of the given circulation desk or department where the resources are located. Mandatory.

parameters.name: circ_desk
parameters.description: The circulation desk where the action is being performed. Mandatory.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location code. Optional.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: The order in which to retrieve the results: location/call_number (default).

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The order direction in which to retrieve the results. Optional.

parameters.name: pickup_inst
parameters.description: The pickup institution. Optional.

parameters.name: reported
parameters.description: Show reported results: Y/N. Optional.

parameters.name: printed
parameters.description: Show printed results: Y/N. Optional.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of results. Optional. Valid values are 0-100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of the results returned. Optional. Default value: 0, which means that the first results will be returned.

200.description: OK - This method returns an object based on rest_requested_resources.xsd. See [here](/alma/apis/docs/xsd/rest_requested_resources.xsd)

400.description:
Bad Request

402119 - 'General error.'

401664 - 'Mandatory field is missing: X.'

40166414 - 'The parameter 'X' is mandatory. Valid options are: Y.'

post.description: This API performs an action on requested resources that are on the shelf in Alma

parameters.name: library
parameters.description: The library of the given circulation desk or department where the resources are located. Mandatory.

parameters.name: circ_desk
parameters.description: The circulation desk where the action is being performed. Mandatory.

parameters.name: op
parameters.description: Operation to be preformed on the list of given requests. Currently the only supported action is 'mark_reported'. Mandatory.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location code. Optional.

parameters.name: pickup_inst
parameters.description: The pickup institution. Optional.

parameters.name: reported
parameters.description: Show reported results: Y/N. Optional.

parameters.name: printed
parameters.description: Show printed results: Y/N. Optional.

200.description: OK - This method returns an object based on rest_requested_resources.xsd. See [here](/alma/apis/docs/xsd/rest_requested_resources.xsd)

400.description:
Bad Request

402119 - 'General error.'

401664 - 'Mandatory field is missing: X.'

40166414 - 'The parameter 'X' is mandatory. Valid options are: Y.'

get.description: This API returns a list of lending requests in Alma

parameters.name: library
parameters.description: The resource sharing library for which lending requests should be retrieved. Mandatory. List of possible libraries can be retrieved using the [GET /almaws/v1/conf/libraries API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4Dp4I8TKv6CAxBlD4LyRaVE=/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed).

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of lending requests to retrieve. Optional. List of possible statuses can be retrieved using the [GET almaws/v1/conf/code-tables/MandatoryLendingWorkflowSteps API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4K7cQ0vuYHLS4NSgDGmcRpRYqx5hIMRTng9SIKO5Vof+/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed) and the  [GET almaws/v1/conf/code-tables/OptionalLendingWorkflowSteps API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4K7cQ0vuYHLS4NSgDGmcRpRYqx5hIMRTng9SIKO5Vof+/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed).

parameters.name: printed
parameters.description: The 'printed' value of lending requests to retrieve. Optional. Possible values: Y, N.

parameters.name: reported
parameters.description: The 'reported' value of lending requests to retrieve. Optional. Possible values: Y, N.

parameters.name: partner
parameters.description: The partner value. Only lending requests from this partner should be retrieved. Optional. List of possible partners can be retrieved using the [GET almaws/v1/partners API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/partners/GET/gwPcGly021piAVNPLaef7suP1zfa6Lui/8883ef41-c3b8-4792-9ff8-cb6b729d6e07).

parameters.name: requested_format
parameters.description: Requested format of the resource. Optional. List of possible formats can be retrieved using the [GET almaws/v1/conf/code-tables/RequestFormats API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4K7cQ0vuYHLS4NSgDGmcRpRYqx5hIMRTng9SIKO5Vof+/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed).

parameters.name: supplied_format
parameters.description: Supplied Format of the resource. Optional. List of possible formats can be retrieved using the [GET almaws/v1/conf/code-tables/RequestFormats API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4K7cQ0vuYHLS4NSgDGmcRpRYqx5hIMRTng9SIKO5Vof+/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed).

200.description: OK - This method returns an object based on rest_user_resource_sharing_requests.xsd. See [here](/alma/apis/docs/xsd/rest_user_resource_sharing_requests.xsd)

400.description:
Bad Request

402119 - 'General error.'

401664 - 'Mandatory field is missing: X.'

40166414 - 'The parameter 'X' is mandatory. Valid options are: Y.'

post.description: This API preforms the requested action on a list (specified by given filters) of lending requests in Alma

parameters.name: library
parameters.description: The resource sharing library from which lending requests should be retrieved. Mandatory. List of possible libraries can be retrieved using the [GET /almaws/v1/conf/libraries API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4Dp4I8TKv6CAxBlD4LyRaVE=/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed).

parameters.name: op
parameters.description: Operation to be preformed on the list of given requests. Currently the only supported action is 'mark_reported'. Mandatory.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of lending requests to retrieve. Optional. List of possible statuses can be retrieved using the [GET almaws/v1/conf/code-tables/MandatoryLendingWorkflowSteps API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4K7cQ0vuYHLS4NSgDGmcRpRYqx5hIMRTng9SIKO5Vof+/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed).and the  [GET almaws/v1/conf/code-tables/OptionalLendingWorkflowSteps API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4K7cQ0vuYHLS4NSgDGmcRpRYqx5hIMRTng9SIKO5Vof+/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed).

parameters.name: printed
parameters.description: The 'printed' value of lending requests to retrieve. Optional. Possible values: Y, N.

parameters.name: reported
parameters.description: The 'reported' value of lending requests to retrieve. Optional. Possible values: Y, N.

parameters.name: partner
parameters.description: The partner value. Only lending requests from this partner should be. Optional. List of possible partners can be retrieved using the [GET almaws/v1/partners API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/partners/GET/gwPcGly021piAVNPLaef7suP1zfa6Lui/8883ef41-c3b8-4792-9ff8-cb6b729d6e07).

parameters.name: requested_format
parameters.description: Requested format of the resource. Optional. List of possible formats can be retrieved using the [GET almaws/v1/conf/code-tables/RequestFormats API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4K7cQ0vuYHLS4NSgDGmcRpRYqx5hIMRTng9SIKO5Vof+/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed).

parameters.name: supplied_format
parameters.description: Supplied Format of the resource. Optional. List of possible formats can be retrieved using the [GET almaws/v1/conf/code-tables/RequestFormats API](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/conf/GET/gwPcGly021p29HpB7XTI4K7cQ0vuYHLS4NSgDGmcRpRYqx5hIMRTng9SIKO5Vof+/37088dc9-c685-4641-bc7f-60b5ca7cabed).

200.description: OK - This method returns an object based on rest_user_resource_sharing_request.xsd. See [here](/alma/apis/docs/xsd/rest_user_resource_sharing_request.xsd)

400.description:
Bad Request

402119 - 'General error.'

401666 - 'X parameter is not valid.'

401664 - 'Mandatory field is missing: X.'

40166414 - 'The parameter 'X' is mandatory. Valid options are: Y.'

get.description: This API is used to test if the API key was configured correctly.It returns a short XML (no schema available - the output is subject to changes) with the following structure:<test>GET - OK - institutionCode: 01ABC_INST</test>

post.description: This API is used to test if the API key was configured correctly, including read/write permissions.It returns a short XML (no schema available - the output is subject to changes) with the following structure:<test>POST - OK</test>

ApiKeyAuth.description: API key used to authorize requests. Learn about how to create API keys at [Alma REST APIs](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/#defining)
ApiKeyAuth.name: apikey

remaining.description: The number of remaining calls according to the [Governance Threshold](https://developers.exlibrisgroup.com/alma/apis/#threshold)
